title: Custom Email Template - 3
subject: Subject is precious -- With token --${subj::43e4a77a-ea21-4962-a69a-dc57203dbe03}
htmlContent:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html lang="en" style="font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10px; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);-ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);">
    <head>
        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <!-- So that mobile will display zoomed in -->
        <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <!-- enable media queries for windows phone 8 -->
        <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no"> <!-- disable auto telephone linking in iOS -->
        <title>Subject is precious -- With token -- ${subj::43e4a77a-ea21-4962-a69a-dc57203dbe03}​</title>
        <style type="text/css">
            html { 
                font-family: sans-serif;
                -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                font-size: 10px;
                -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
            }
            body,.bodywrapper {
                margin: 0;
                padding:0;
                font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 14px;
                line-height: 1.42857143;
                color: #333333;
                background-color: #ffffff;
            }
            .emailbuilder_main{
                word-break: break-word;
                word-wrap: break-word;
            }
            .ExternalClass {
                width: 100%;
            }

            .ExternalClass,
            .ExternalClass p,
            .ExternalClass span,
            .ExternalClass font,
            .ExternalClass td,
            .ExternalClass div {
                line-height: 100%;
            }

            .ReadMsgBody {
                width: 100%;
                background-color: #ebebeb;
            }

            .content {
                /*padding-top: 5px;
                padding-bottom: 5px;*/
                background-color: #ffffff;
            }
            .container-padding {
                padding-left: 24px;
                padding-right: 24px;
            }
            .footer-text {
                font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 12px;
                line-height: 16px;
                color: #4F4F4F;
            }
            .footer-text a {
                color: #4F4F4F;
            }

            table {
                mso-table-lspace: 0pt;
                mso-table-rspace: 0pt;
            }

            img {
                -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
            }

            .yshortcuts a {
                border-bottom: none !important;
            }

            @media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
                table[class="force-row"],
                table[class="container"] {
                    width: 100% !important;
                    max-width: 100% !important;
                }
            }
            @media screen and (max-width: 400px) {
                td[class*="container-padding"] {
                    padding-left: 12px !important;
                    padding-right: 12px !important;
                }
            }
            .ios-footer a {
                color: #4F4F4F !important;
                text-decoration: underline;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body style="font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);" bgcolor="#ffffff" leftmargin="0" topmargin="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0">
        <!-- 100% background wrapper (grey background) -->
        <table border="0" width="100%" height="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" bgcolor="#ffffff" class="bodywrapper" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
            <tbody><tr>
                <td align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="background-color: #ffffff;padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;padding-top: 5px;padding-bottom: 5px">
                    <!-- 600px container (white background) -->
                    <table border="0" width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="container emailbuilder_container" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
                        <tbody><tr>
                            <td class="content emailbuilder_main" align="left" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); word-break: break-word; word-wrap: break-word; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">
                                <div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;">Hi ${embd::6fd5ef90-9baa-4cd7-a132-c7db6f2ad714}<span style="box-sizing: border-box;">​</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box;">​</span>,</div><blockquote style="box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 14px; margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; border: none; padding: 0px;"><div style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; text-align: left;" class="polyfixpara"></div><ul style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;"><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">We have a release coming up on December 22nd for GonG release &amp; January 7 for Customer release.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">Considering the series of regressions that we have been hitting - I am anxious to know the following:</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">Do we have a clear communication from each team on what the team is planning to include in Dec 22nd release?</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">we are expected to have a 2 week sprint for the QA team to provide sign off.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;"><strong style="font-weight: bold; box-sizing: border-box;">For Dec 22 release - I understand that this would be a little ambitious; but I'd say that not less than 1 clear week must be provided to the QA team for release sign off. This means we must have stable betas in every way by Dec 15 or earlier.</strong></span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;"><em style="box-sizing: border-box;">For Feb 4 - we must hit feature freeze by Jan 21 and have stable betas to ensure 2 week sprint for QA team to provide release sign off.</em></span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(230, 56, 25);"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">Please review and communicate on the status of your commitments for Dec 22nd and Feb 4th releases.</span></span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">If stable Dev Builds are NOT available on time; then the features will have to go in the next release. Taking this into account, please identify any risks and communicate asap.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">Scrum Masters - please share these with your teams.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">More on this soon - <span style="box-sizing: border-box; text-decoration: underline;">one thing that I'd say is that for THIS release; we are prepared to take a "short term hit" on delivering less than what we committed for; but we MUST step up on the quality of our releases</span>.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">We are NOT prepared to cut short on the QA cycles with delayed dev drop dates, last minute change requests; prolonged beta requests [knowing that sometimes these happen due to valid reasons] etc etc.</span></li><li style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">We will build out the engineering release calendar including the internal milestones for delivering builds to the QA team.</span></li></ul><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"></div></blockquote><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"></div><table class="buttonLinkCntr" width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; max-width: 100%; background-color: transparent;"><tbody style="box-sizing: border-box;"><tr style="box-sizing: border-box;"><td valign="top" contenteditable="false" style="padding: 0px 0px 10px; box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center;"><table class="buttonLink standardBtn" style="border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; width: 75%; background-color: transparent;" align="center"><tbody style="box-sizing: border-box;"><tr style="box-sizing: border-box;"><td contenteditable="false" style="padding: 9px 0px 8px; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; word-break: break-word; text-align: center; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 28px; font-size: 16px; display: block; border-radius: 4px; width: auto !important; background: rgb(91, 200, 91);"><a href="https://www.gainsight.com" target="_blank" style="box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; display: block; font-size: 16px; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(242, 242, 242); background-color: transparent;">Gainsight Home</a></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"></div><div class="polyfixpara me-inline-img" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px; display: block; vertical-align: bottom;">​ <span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">​</span><div class="imgcntr" style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857; display: inline-block; min-width: 18px; min-height: 18px;"><a href="http://gainsight.com" target="_blank" style="box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; color: rgb(17, 85, 204); text-decoration: underline; background-color: transparent;"><img alt="logo.png" src="http://www.gainsight.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/logo.png" style="border: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; vertical-align: middle; display: inline;"></a></div><span style="box-sizing: border-box; line-height: 1.42857;">​</span></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box;">Thanks,</span></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box;">${embd::5b84d9fa-ab21-4924-b5da-013e23f39af4}<span style="box-sizing: border-box;">​</span>.​</span></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div class="polyfixpara" style="box-sizing: border-box; padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        <tr><td><br></td></tr>
                    </tbody></table><!--/600px container -->
                </td>
            </tr>
        </tbody></table><!--/100% background wrapper-->
    

</body>
</html>
